try {
			CallableStatement stmt = conn.prepareCall("{call  insert_user(?,?)}");
			System.out.println("Enter your name :");
			String studentname = sc.next();
			System.out.println("Enter your age :");
			int studentage = sc.nextInt();
			stmt.setString(1, studentname);
			stmt.setInt(2, studentage);
			
			int i = stmt.executeUpdate();
			
			if (i>0)
			{
				System.out.println("Record is added");
			}
			else 
			{
				System.out.println("Record is not added");
			}
		
			
			
			
			
		} catch (SQLException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
				
        
        
        DELIMITER $$

CREATE PROCEDURE insert_user(IN sname varchar(20) , sage int)
BEGIN
	insert into student(name , age) values (sname , sage);
   
END $$

DELIMITER ;

call  insert_user("Jiya",45);
